meta.title: HelixMind — AI Coding CLI with Spiral Memory
meta.description: The only AI coding tool that remembers everything. Persistent spiral memory, 3D brain visualization, and intelligent context that grows with your project.

hero.title: Your AI finally
hero.subtitle: The only AI coding tool with persistent spiral memory. Every pattern, every decision, every context — preserved and evolved across sessions.

problem.title: The problem with every AI coding tool
problem.subtitle: Every session starts from zero. Your AI forgets everything.

points.context: Lost context costs hours of debugging
points.patterns: Your coding patterns are never learned

spiral.title: Spiral Memory — Context that evolves
spiral.subtitle: Six levels of intelligent memory that grows, decays, and adapts with your project.

l1.name: Focus
l1.desc: Hot context — what you're working on right now

l2.name: Active
l2.desc: Recent patterns and decisions still in play

l6.name: Web Knowledge
l6.desc: Auto-fetched documentation and web insights, always up to date

features.title: Built for developers who ship
features.subtitle: Everything you need to code faster with persistent AI context.

memory.title: Spiral Memory
memory.desc: 5-level memory system that evolves. Context promotes on use, decays when stale.
memory.modalDesc: A 5-level memory system inspired by how human memory works. Knowledge automatically promotes when referenced frequently and gracefully decays when no longer relevant.

brain.title: 3D Brain Visualization
brain.desc: See your AI's knowledge as a living 3D helix. Watch connections form in real-time.
brain.modalDesc: A real-time 3D helix visualization of your spiral memory. Watch nodes light up as knowledge flows between levels, with connections forming live as the AI works.

validation.title: Validation Matrix
validation.desc: 3-phase validation catches bugs before they exist. Static, dynamic, and knowledge checks.
validation.modalDesc: A 3-phase validation pipeline that classifies every task, applies static and dynamic checks, then validates against your spiral knowledge to catch issues before they reach production.

web.title: Web Knowledge Enricher
web.desc: Auto-fetches relevant documentation and stores it in your brain. Always up to date.
web.modalTitle: Web Knowledge — Always up to date
web.modalDesc: Automatically detects topics during conversation, searches the web for relevant documentation and best practices, then stores extracted knowledge in your spiral brain as L6 nodes.
capabilities: Explicit web_research tool for deep dives

offline.title: Fully Offline Capable
offline.desc: Run with Ollama locally. Your data never leaves your machine. Zero cloud dependency.
offline.modalTitle: Offline Mode — Your machine, your data
offline.modalDesc: Run HelixMind entirely on your local machine with Ollama. Auto-detects local models, pulls new ones on demand, and keeps every byte of your data private.

sessions.title: Multi-Session Agent
sessions.desc: Background security audits, parallel code analysis. Each with its own context.
sessions.modalDesc: Run multiple agent sessions simultaneously. Each session gets its own context, history, undo stack, and agent controller. Switch between sessions with keyboard shortcuts.

monitor.title: Security Monitor
monitor.desc: Autonomous system guardian. Detects threats, blocks attacks, and rotates secrets — passive, defensive, or active mode.
monitor.modalDesc: An autonomous security system that continuously monitors your project for threats. Three modes let you choose your protection level: passive observation, defensive blocking, or active response.

comparison.title: How HelixMind compares
comparison.subtitle: The only tool with persistent, evolving memory.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Start free. Upgrade when you need Jarvis AGI, cloud sync, and team features.

free.name: Open Source
free.desc: Full CLI agent, unlimited local use.

freePlus.name: Free+
freePlus.desc: Login for Jarvis AGI + Brain Management.

pro.name: Pro
pro.desc: Power-user with cloud sync and deep thinking.

cta.title: Start building with memory
cta.subtitle: Install HelixMind in 30 seconds. Free forever for individual use.

footer.tagline: AI Coding CLI with Spiral Memory. Open Source. AGPL-3.0.

cookieConsent.title: We value your privacy
cookieConsent.description: We use cookies to ensure our website functions properly. Essential cookies are required for core functionality. You can choose to enable additional cookies below.
cookieConsent.settingsDescription: Choose which cookies you want to allow. You can change these settings at any time.
cookieConsent.essentialDesc: Required for the website to function. These cookies enable core functionality like authentication and session management.
cookieConsent.analyticsDesc: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website. All data is anonymized.
cookieConsent.marketingDesc: Used to deliver relevant advertisements and track campaign effectiveness.

app.title: HelixMind App
app.noMessagesHint: Ask anything about your code, debug issues, or explore ideas.
app.setupDesc: The web app connects to your local HelixMind CLI agent. Follow these steps to get started.
app.setupStep1Desc: Install HelixMind globally on your machine or server via npm.
app.setupStep2Desc: Set your AI provider and API key. Supports Anthropic, OpenAI, Ollama (offline), Groq, DeepSeek, and more.
app.setupStep3Desc: Open a terminal in your project directory and launch the interactive agent.
app.setupStep4Desc: Creates .helixmind/ with a local spiral memory database and context.md for project-specific instructions.
app.setupStep5Desc: This app scans localhost automatically and connects to running CLI instances. Once connected, you can chat, run audits, and control agents from here.
app.notConnectedHint: Start HelixMind CLI locally or connect via relay to begin.
app.confirmDeleteDesc: This will permanently delete all messages in this chat.
app.notConnectedHintShort: Connect a CLI instance to send messages
app.consoleSelectSession: Select a session to view its output
app.consoleHint: Start Auto, Security, or Monitor via buttons or /auto, /security, /monitor commands.
app.monitorIdleHint: Start a monitor session with the button below or type /monitor in the chat.
app.brainstormHint: Chatting directly with AI. Connect a CLI instance for agent capabilities.
app.noInstances: No CLI instances found. Start HelixMind CLI locally.
app.skipPermissionsWarning: Tools will execute without confirmation. Use with caution.
app.noApiKey: Add your API key in Settings to brainstorm without CLI
app.bugNoBugsHint: Bugs are automatically detected from conversations.
app.bugConnectToFix: Connect a CLI instance to fix bugs
app.noCliFound: No CLI instances found. Start HelixMind CLI with: npx helixmind
app.chatTabHint: Send messages to your AI agent. Connect a CLI instance for full agent capabilities.
app.consoleTabHint: Terminal output of your running sessions. Start with /auto or /security.
app.monitorTabHint: Security dashboard for threats, defenses, and approvals.
app.jarvisIdleHint: Start the autonomous task daemon to process your task queue.
app.jarvisNoTasksHint: Add tasks via the form above or use /jarvis task in the CLI.
app.jarvisNoProposalsHint: Jarvis will generate proposals during thinking cycles.
app.helpCommands:
**Available commands:**
`/auto [goal]` — Start auto agent
`/security` — Run security audit
`/monitor [mode]` — Start security monitor
`/jarvis` — Switch to Jarvis tab
`/jarvis task "..."` — Add task
`/connect` — Connect to CLI instance
`/disconnect` — Disconnect CLI
`/console` — Switch to console tab
`/chat` — Switch to chat tab
`/brain` — Open 3D brain visualization
`/bugs` — Toggle bug journal
`/bugfix` — Fix all open bugs
`/stop [id]` — Stop sessions
`/help` — Show this help
app.consoleInfoDesc: Run automated code reviews, security audits, and background tasks. The Console displays terminal output from your AI agent sessions.
app.consoleInfoFeature1Desc: Automated code analysis — finds bugs, code smells, and suggests improvements across your entire project.
app.consoleInfoFeature2Desc: Scans for vulnerabilities, exposed secrets, unsafe dependencies, and security best practices.
app.consoleInfoFeature3Desc: Run any background task with full terminal output. Sessions continue while you work in other tabs.
app.monitorInfoDesc: Real-time security monitoring for your project. Detects threats, activates defenses, and requires approval for critical actions.
app.monitorInfoFeature1Desc: Watches for threats and reports them without taking action. Good for observing what happens.
app.monitorInfoFeature2Desc: Automatically blocks common threats and asks for approval on critical ones.
app.monitorInfoFeature3Desc: Aggressive threat response — automatically takes defensive action on all detected threats.
app.jarvisInfoDesc: Autonomous AI assistant that manages your task queue. Jarvis plans, executes, and learns from your project — working in the background while you focus on what matters.
app.jarvisInfoFeature1Desc: Add tasks with priorities. Jarvis picks them up, plans execution, and works through them autonomously.
app.jarvisInfoFeature2Desc: Multi-phase thinking cycles — quick checks, medium analysis, and deep reasoning for complex decisions.
app.jarvisInfoFeature3Desc: Parallel task execution with multiple workers. Proposals require your approval before critical changes.

ticket.subjectMinLength: Subject must be at least 5 characters
ticket.subjectMaxLength: Subject must be less than 200 characters
ticket.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your issue in detail. Include steps to reproduce, expected behavior, and any error messages...
ticket.descriptionMinLength: Description must be at least 10 characters
ticket.descriptionMaxLength: Description must be less than 5000 characters
